question: When you enter a website what is the first thing you notice ?
answer: I like the snazzy animations. They look so cool!
I like how everything is organized and how the information is shown
I like how they offer me cookies right from the start
I think about where is this information stored

question: How do you feel about the Internet as you know it ?
answer: I think it has really evolved from since its beginnings
There is so much to see and experience in the world and it allows me to be a part of that
I can speak to it and it talks back!
I only hope someone is making hard copies of this as we go!
